metadata.title: CVE-2012-6647 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The futex_wait_requeue_pi function in kernel/futex.c in the Linux kernelbefore 3.5.1 does not ensure that calls have two different futex addresses,which allows local users to cause a denial of service (NULL pointerdereference and system crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact viaa crafted FUTEX_WAIT_REQUEUE_PI command.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6647` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
